|brand = AVM |model = FRITZ!Box 7590 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (HW226) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PXB4583;PXB4583EL2000, S7123N11, SLLZR; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = IA |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 GHz / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF4GE8AB-TI; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:CE:1E |oui = CC:CE:1E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VDSL2, ADSL2+, 35b, DECT, MU-MIMO, |addchip = xDSL AFE;Lantiq;PSB 80318;S7164149, SLM30;1; ,,, DECT Chip;Dialog;SC14446;DIALOG, SC14446, A76R101LVP;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.178.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = FRITZ!Box 7590 |defaultssid_regex = ^FRITZ!Box 7590$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/06/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4023125028045 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B071W8R4PS |asin_country = DE |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9985; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :4x4 MU-MIMO, 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0 :VDSL-35b/ADSL2+ Modem, DECT, Media Server {{See also|AVM FRITZ!Box 7590 AX|AVM}}
*{{boxmatrix|7590}} :CPU: VR11 @1.0GHz (Dual Core), Modem: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318, RAM: 512MB :mips34_512MB_grx5_dect446_5geth_2ab_isdn_nt_te_pots_2usb_2wlan11n
===Specifications=== :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] GRX550, WLAN: 2x [[QCA]] QCA9984 :PXB4583EL2000 (SLLZR) 2x @1.0GHz ([[MIPS 34Kc]]) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF4GE8AB-TI (512MB NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI (512MB DDR3) :xDSL AFE: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318 M V1.2 (XWAY VRX318) :FPGA: ''Xilinx'' Spartan XC6SLX4; DECT: ''Dialog'' SC14446 <!-- Hardware Inside the case, the FRITZ!Box 7590 is equipped with a dual-core Intel Lantiq AnyWAN GRX550 PXB4583 (SLLZR) SoC @1.0GHz, :512MB of flash storage (Macronix MXIC MX30LF4GE8AB-TI), 512MB of RAM (NANYA NT5CC256M16EP-DI), a LITELINK CPC5622A Int. :Circuits Telecom Interface, a DIALOG SC14446 (A76R101LVP) DECT SoC, an XILINK SPARTAN-6 XC6SLX4 (TQ144BIV1741) FPGA :(Field-Programmable Gate Array IC), a WE-NIDCOM 40799 SOP-IC, five Wurth Electronics 7490200141 1745 Transformers :and it also uses the Lantiq (Intel) PXB4583 as a switch chip -->
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/fritz/fritzbox-7590-ac2600/ ''FRITZ!Box 7590 AC2600'' on '''RedesZone'''] *[https://www.mbreviews.com/fritzbox-7590-review/ ''FRITZ!Box 7590 AC2600'' on '''MBReviews'''] <!-- ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.ip-phone-forum.de/threads/das-innenleben-einer-7580-platinen-bilder.287251/ On '''iP-phone''' forums] *[https://www.onlinekosten.de/forum/showthread.php?t=147622&page=6 On '''OnlineKosten''' forums] *[http://extreme.pcgameshardware.de/internet-und-netzwerk/265117-howto-dsl-leitungstuning-oder-wie-hole-ich-einfach-mehr-heraus-157.html On '''PCGamesHardware''' forums]-->
==See also== *https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/ *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7590]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7582]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(BCM63138, G.fast VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7580]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7560]] - AC1300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2, VoIP, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7430]] - N450 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, VoIP/DECT, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7390]] - N300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL, DECT-Basis, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 5490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4040]] - AC1300 WLAN Router :(GbE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0/3.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4020]] - N450 WLAN Router :(FE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 3490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, 4x GbE LAN, Mediaserver)
